channel.title: Please help! attack delay
channel.description:
i seen a server where attacking npcs is 3 times faster then attacking players, i was told that to do that i have to divide the npc attack delay, i couldnt find witch file has the attack delay
im using this client: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?4eyzi2mnbf1 its bluurs
btw whats the latest bluurs client?

item.title: Please help! attack delay
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

im using a custom source… its actually a rip from 3 diff sources… but its mostly delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! attack delay
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

  1. What client you’re using doesn’t have ANYTHING to do with this problem
  2. Bluurr’s clients fail. All non-renamed clients do. Switch to galkons refactored, or mitb’s deob.

What source are you using?

Read full topic
